languages.text: "Хм. Могу понять ваш сантимент, но лоботомировать весь экипаж — предприятие дорогостоящее и в конечном итоге не оправдывающее себя. Пока мы справляемся традиционными методами — пускай оно идет как заведено".

"Hmm. I can understand your view, but lobotomising the entire crew is a costly and ultimately unjustifiable undertaking. As long as the traditional methods serve us well enough, things should continue as they are."
languages.original_text: "Хм. Могу понять ваш сантимент, но лоботомировать весь экипаж — предприятие дорогостоящее и в конечном итоге не оправдывающее себя. Пока мы справляемся традиционными методами — пускай оно идет как заведено".

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “嗯，我能理解你的观点，但对全体船员进行脑叶切除手术花费高昂，而且没有任何正当理由。只要传统的方式还能很好地为我们服务，一切就该继续保持原样。”
languages.original_text: "Hmm. I can understand your view, but lobotomising the entire crew is a costly and ultimately unjustifiable undertaking. As long as the traditional methods serve us well enough, things should continue as they are."

traits.locale_text: “嗯，我能理解你的观点，但对全体船员进行脑叶切除手术花费高昂，而且没有任何正当理由。只要传统的方式还能很好地为我们服务，一切就该继续保持原样。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Hmm... Je comprends votre point de vue, mais lobotomiser tout un équipage coûte cher et n'est généralement pas justifié. Tant que les méthodes traditionnelles fonctionnent, je ne vois pas de raison de faire autrement. »
languages.original_text: "Hmm. I can understand your view, but lobotomising the entire crew is a costly and ultimately unjustifiable undertaking. As long as the traditional methods serve us well enough, things should continue as they are."

traits.locale_text: « Hmm... Je comprends votre point de vue, mais lobotomiser tout un équipage coûte cher et n'est généralement pas justifié. Tant que les méthodes traditionnelles fonctionnent, je ne vois pas de raison de faire autrement. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Hmm. Ich kann Eure Ansicht verstehen, doch die gesamte Crew einer Lobotomie zu unterziehen, ist ein kostspieliges und letztlich nicht zu rechtfertigendes Unterfangen. So lange die traditionellen Methoden uns ausreichend gut dienen, sollte alles so weitergehen wie bisher."
languages.original_text: "Hmm. I can understand your view, but lobotomising the entire crew is a costly and ultimately unjustifiable undertaking. As long as the traditional methods serve us well enough, things should continue as they are."

traits.locale_text: "Hmm. Ich kann Eure Ansicht verstehen, doch die gesamte Crew einer Lobotomie zu unterziehen, ist ein kostspieliges und letztlich nicht zu rechtfertigendes Unterfangen. So lange die traditionellen Methoden uns ausreichend gut dienen, sollte alles so weitergehen wie bisher."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ふむ。その見解は理解できますが、クルー全員にロボトミー手術を施すには費用がかかりますし、究極的には道理に背く行いです。伝統的な方法で十分な奉公ができている間は、現状の方法を続けるべきです」
languages.original_text: "Hmm. I can understand your view, but lobotomising the entire crew is a costly and ultimately unjustifiable undertaking. As long as the traditional methods serve us well enough, things should continue as they are."

traits.locale_text: 「ふむ。その見解は理解できますが、クルー全員にロボトミー手術を施すには費用がかかりますし、究極的には道理に背く行いです。伝統的な方法で十分な奉公ができている間は、現状の方法を続けるべきです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Mmm. Comprendo la perspectiva, pero lobotomizar a toda la tripulación es un proceso costoso y, a la larga, injustificable. Mientras los métodos tradicionales sigan funcionando, es mejor dejar las cosas como están».
languages.original_text: "Hmm. I can understand your view, but lobotomising the entire crew is a costly and ultimately unjustifiable undertaking. As long as the traditional methods serve us well enough, things should continue as they are."

traits.locale_text: «Mmm. Comprendo la perspectiva, pero lobotomizar a toda la tripulación es un proceso costoso y, a la larga, injustificable. Mientras los métodos tradicionales sigan funcionando, es mejor dejar las cosas como están».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Hımm. Size hak veriyorum lakin tüm mürettebatı işlevsiz kılmak, hem ciddi bir maliyeti beraberinde getirecek hem de son derece gereksiz olacaktır. Geleneksel yöntemler işimizi gördüğü müddetçe eski usullerden şaşmamalı."
languages.original_text: "Hmm. I can understand your view, but lobotomising the entire crew is a costly and ultimately unjustifiable undertaking. As long as the traditional methods serve us well enough, things should continue as they are."
